attributes.review: TIKTOK LIVES MATTER! ALL LIVES MATTER! Fiest Donald trump is president out of luck. Second he is trying to get all of my Mexican family over to Mexico where they have created amazing lives here and are citizens of america. My Mexican fam have also been in the military. Get this app banned from the App Store by rating it one star!
attributes.title: Tiktok

attributes.review: I am very disappointed with this app, I was happy to download it but when I got to the welcome page it was HORRIFIED... the image on my screen was HORRENDOUS!!!!😡 should I mention it made my vision blurry for the next 3 DAYS. I had to waste my time and money to go get eye drops. VERY disappointed
attributes.title: Made my vision blurry

attributes.review: i was annoyed by everything thing. this app was not well made. it took for ever to download and wouldn’t work for an hour. and the app just wouldn’t work. it needs an update. i got friends and they feel the same. so yeah TAKE THIS APP DOWN
attributes.title: this was a horrible app✨🍃🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: This app keeps taking me to an orangutan, and it’s bothering me. Also the app supports someone who’s is a child m*lester, racist, and just all around horrible person. This app almost made me die from my eyes being hurt from looking at the 🦧
attributes.title: I almost went blind due to the worst app and worst Pres🙈

attributes.review: I was trying to eat some oranges to support the orange god but his wig came for my fridge and ate it so I grabbed some scissors and split his weave so the orange god came to my door asking where his weave went and I told him to leave me alone and I’ll be leaving a 1 star on your app for not letting me eat my orange for you mighty orange god
attributes.title: His wig ate my fridge 😤😡

attributes.review: I never received spam calls before on my new phone but ever since I downloaded this I’ve been getting at least 5 calls a day!!! Sometimes even calls at night!!! Awful app!
attributes.title: Sold my information

attributes.review: I don’t really know anybody with support Trump because he’s a very racist person he’s trying to ban one of the most famous apps out there in America and I really don’t think it’s fair because there are a lot of people who put their lives to make money off of it
attributes.title: Trumps a ugly rat

attributes.review: I feel like the US government is taking information. Apparently since they think other apps are taking information by using them 🧚🏼‍♀️. Also the name is wrong, 2020 isn’t all for trump when another president gets elected it won’t be Trump 2020 😊.
attributes.title: Very Bad bad 😖

attributes.review: This app has no reason to be here this app literally gives no reason on why we need it the app l think we should just take it down why do we need it they give us no reason to down load it pls ppl don’t down load it I’m begging u
attributes.title: Hate this app

attributes.review: Because of this app I have felt nothing but pain. I don’t even want to get out of my room and never come out. My parents are worried about my health and friends are too. This is stressing my mom out and I’m scared she might have a heart attack pls do better.
attributes.title: This app made me depressed
